content: I don't have access to current information on usc's group meetings. however, i can tell you that in response to the covid-19 pandemic, the usc has shifted its mental health and wellness services online to ensure that students can access these resources remotely. it's possible that the support groups are currently held online, but it's best to visit the usc counseling and mental health services website or contact them directly to confirm the current meeting format. they should have updated information and resources available for students regarding the covid-19 pandemic and its impact on mental health services.
